verses.verse: The elders <S%G4245><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> I exhort <S%G3870><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> am also an elder <S%G4850><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a witness <S%G3144><s%> of the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and also <S%G2532><s%> a partaker <S%G2844><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> that shall <S%G3195><s%> be revealed <S%G601><s%>:

Feed <S%G4165><s%> the flock <S%G4168><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, taking the oversight <S%G1983><s%> there <S%G3361><s%>, not by constraint <S%G317><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> willingly <S%G1596><s%>; not <S%G3366><s%> for filthy money <S%G147><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of a ready mind <S%G4290><s%>;
Neither <S%G3366><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> being lords over <S%G2634><s%> God <S%G2819><s%>'s heritage, but <S%G235><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> examples <S%G5179><s%> to the flock <S%G4168><s%>.
And when <S%G2532><s%> the chief Shepherd <S%G750><s%> shall appear <S%G5319><s%>, you shall receive <S%G2865><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> that fades not away <S%G262><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3668><s%>, you younger <S%G3501><s%>, submit <S%G5293><s%> yourselves <S%G240><s%> to the elder <S%G4245><s%>. Yes <S%G1161><s%>, all <S%G3956><s%> of you be subject one to another <S%G5293><s%>, and be clothed with <S%G1463><s%> humility <S%G5012><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> resists <S%G498><s%> the proud <S%G5244><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to the humble <S%G5011><s%>.

Humble yourselves <S%G5013><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the mighty <S%G2900><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he may exalt <S%G5312><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> due time <S%G2540><s%>:

Casting <S%G1977><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> care <S%G3308><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G846><s%> cares <S%G3199><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.

Be sober <S%G3525><s%>, be vigilant <S%G1127><s%>; because <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> adversary <S%G476><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a roaring <S%G5612><s%> lion <S%G3023><s%>, walks about <S%G4043><s%>, seeking <S%G2212><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> he may devour <S%G2666><s%>:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> resist <S%G436><s%> steadfast <S%G4731><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%>, knowing that <S%G1492><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> afflictions <S%G3804><s%> are accomplished <S%G2005><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> brothers <S%G81><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> has called <S%G2564><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, after that you have suffered <S%G3958><s%> a while <S%G3641><s%>, <S%G846><s%> make <S%G2675><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> perfect <S%G2675><s%>, establish <S%G4741><s%>, strengthen <S%G4599><s%>, settle you <S%G2311><s%>.
To him <S%G846><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

By <S%G1223><s%> Silvanus <S%G4610><s%>, a faithful <S%G4103><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> I suppose <S%G3049><s%>, I have written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G99999><s%> briefly <S%G3641><s%>, exhorting <S%G3870><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> testifying <S%G1957><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> the true <S%G227><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> where <S%G1519><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you stand <S%G2476><s%>.

The church that is at <S%G1722><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%>, elected together with <S%G4899><s%> you <S%G782><s%>, greets you <S%G5209><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> so does Marcus <S%G3138><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>.

Greet you <S%G782><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a kiss <S%G5370><s%> of love <S%G26><s%>. Peace <S%G1515><s%> be with you <S%G5213><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
